author: Reuters Editorial
title: Chinese president Xi says optimistic about China's economy: Xinhua
text:
BEIJING (Reuters) - Chinese President Xi Jinping on Wednesday said he is optimistic about Chinaâ€™s economy and that the country will provide a better environment for domestic and foreign entrepreneurship and investment, the official state news agency Xinhua reported.
Chinese President Xi Jinping delivers a speech at an annual meeting of the Boao Forum for Asia in Boao, in the southern Chinese province of Hainan, in this photo taken by Kyodo April 10, 2018. Mandatory credit Kyodo/via REUTERS Xi made the comments while attending the Boao Forum for Asia in southern Hainan province.
Reporting by Beijing Monitoring Desk; Editing by Shri Navaratnam
